item.description: An Introduction to R: Data Cleaning, Wrangling, and Visualizing class: center, middle, my-title, title-slide # An Introduction to R: Data Cleaning, Wrangling, and Visualizing ### Daniel Katz --- class: middle # Introduction + I'm a fourth year grad student at UCSB + Began chipping away at learning R about four years ago + It was really frustrating + After a major project or two, it became my preferred tool for most things data analysis + I don't expect you to be experts after this session, but I hope you know where to start!
